00036     public function get($var = null, $default = null) {
00037         $name = $this->__configVarNames($var);
00038 
00039         if (empty($name)) {
00040             return $this->data;
00041         }
00042 
00043         switch (count($name)) {
00044             case 5:
00045                 if (isset($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]][$name[4]])) {
00046                     return $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]][$name[4]];
00047                 }
00048                 break;
00049             case 4:
00050                 if (isset($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]])) {
00051                     return $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]];
00052                 }
00053                 break;
00054             case 3:
00055                 if (isset($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]])) {
00056                     return $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]];
00057                 }
00058                 break;
00059             case 2:
00060                 if (isset($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]])) {
00061                     return $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]];
00062                 }
00063                 break;
00064             case 1:
00065                 if (isset($this->data[$name[0]])) {
00066                     return $this->data[$name[0]];
00067                 }
00068                 break;
00069             default:
00070                 throw new MOC_Configuration_Exception(sprintf('Unable to get the key. Depth is invalid ("%s")', count($name)));
00071         }
00072 
00073         return $default;
00074     }

00090     public function check($key) {
00091         if (!is_array($key)) {
00092             $key = array($key);
00093         }
00094 
00095         $exists = true;
00096 
00097         foreach ($key as $field) {
00098             $name = $this->__configVarNames($field);
00099             switch (count($name)) {
00100                 case 1:
00101                     $exists = $exists && array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data);
00102                     break;
00103                 case 2:
00104                     $exists = $exists && (array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]]) && array_key_exists($name[1], $this->data[$name[0]]));
00105                     break;
00106                 case 3:
00107                     $exists = $exists && (array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]]) && array_key_exists($name[1], $this->data[$name[0]]) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) && array_key_exists($name[2], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]));
00108                     break;
00109                 case 4:
00110                     $exists = $exists && (array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]]) && array_key_exists($name[1], $this->data[$name[0]]) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) && array_key_exists($name[2], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) &&
00111                         is_array($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]]) && array_key_exists($name[3], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]]));
00112                     break;
00113                 case 5:
00114                     $exists = $exists && (array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]]) && array_key_exists($name[1], $this->data[$name[0]]) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) && array_key_exists($name[2], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) &&
00115                         is_array($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]]) && array_key_exists($name[3], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[3]]) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]]) && array_key_exists($name[4], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]]));
00116                     break;
00117                 default:
00118                     throw new MOC_Configuration_Exception(sprintf('Unable to check if key exists. Depth is invalid ("%s")', count($name)));
00119             }
00120         }

00122         return $exists;

00130     public function delete($key) {
00131         if (!$this->check($key)) {
00132             return false;
00133         }
00134 
00135         $name = $this->__configVarNames($key);
00136         switch (count($name)) {
00137             case 1:
00138                 if (array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data)) {
00139                     unset($this->data[$name[0]]);
00140                     return true;
00141                 }
00142                 break;
00143             case 2:
00144                 if (array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]]) && array_key_exists($name[1], $this->data[$name[0]])) {
00145                     unset($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]);
00146                     return true;
00147                 }
00148                 break;
00149             case 3:
00150                 if (array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]]) && array_key_exists($name[1], $this->data[$name[0]]) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) && array_key_exists($name[2], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]])) {
00151                     unset($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]]);
00152                     return true;
00153                 }
00154                 break;
00155             case 4:
00156                 if (array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]]) && array_key_exists($name[1], $this->data[$name[0]]) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) && array_key_exists($name[2], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) && array_key_exists
00157                     ($name[2], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]])) {
00158                     unset($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]]);
00159                     return true;
00160                 }
00161                 break;
00162             case 5:
00163                 if (array_key_exists($name[0], $this->data) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]]) && array_key_exists($name[1], $this->data[$name[0]]) && is_array($this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) && array_key_exists($name[2], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]]) && array_key_exists
00164                     ($name[2], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]]) && array_key_exists($name[2], $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]])) {

00169             default:
00170                 throw new MOC_Configuration_Exception(sprintf('Unable to delete the key. Depth is invalid ("%s")', count($name)));

00182             throw new MOC_Configuration_Exception(sprintf('Required configuration setting "%s" is missing', $key));

00193     public function validate($key, $method) {
00194         if (!$this->check($key)) {
00195             return false;
00196         }
00197         return call_user_func($method, $this->get($key));
00198     }

00206     public function set($config, $value = null) {
00207         if (!is_array($config)) {
00208             $config = array($config => $value);
00209         }
00210 
00211         foreach ($config as $names => $value) {
00212             $name = $this->__configVarNames($names);
00213             switch (count($name)) {
00214                 case 5:
00215                     $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]][$name[4]] = $value;
00216                     break;
00217                 case 4:
00218                     $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]][$name[3]] = $value;
00219                     break;
00220                 case 3:
00221                     $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]][$name[2]] = $value;
00222                     break;
00223                 case 2:
00224                     $this->data[$name[0]][$name[1]] = $value;
00225                     break;
00226                 case 1:
00227                     $this->data[$name[0]] = $value;
00228                     break;
00229                 default:
00230                     throw new MOC_Configuration_Exception(sprintf('Unable to set the value. Depth is invalid ("%s")', count($name)));
00231             }
00232         }
00233     }

00241     public function setDefaultIfEmpty($path, $value) {
00242         if ($this->check($path)) {
00243             return false;
00244         }
00245         $this->set($path, $value);

00256     public function filterByValue($path, $itemKey, $allowed) {
00257         if (!is_array($allowed)) {
00258             $allowed = array($allowed);
00259         }
00260 
00261         $filtered = 0;
00262         $pathValues = $this->get($path);
00263         foreach ($pathValues as $key => $value) {
00264             if (false === array_search($value[$itemKey], $allowed)) {
00265                 $this->delete($path . '.' . $key);
00266                 $filtered++;
00267                 continue;
00268             }
00269         }
00270 
00271         return $filtered;
00272     }

00281     public function extractKeys($keys) {
00282         $Configuration = new MOC_Configuration();
00283         foreach ($keys as $key => $value) {
00284             if (is_numeric($key)) {
00285                 $key = $value;
00286             }
00287 
00288             $Configuration->set($key, $this->get($value));
00289         }
00290         return $Configuration;
00291     }

00298     public function merge($settings) {
00299         if (empty($settings) || !is_array($settings)) {
00300             throw new MOC_Configuration_Exception('Unabale to merge settings, invalid data provided');
00301         }
00302 
00303         $this->data = MOC_Array::merge($this->data, $settings);
00304     }

00312     public function loadFromExtConf($extKey, $return = false) {
00313         global $TYPO3_CONF_VARS, $TYPO3_LOADED_EXT;
00314 
00315         // Check if EXT_CONF_KEY exists in the TYPO3_CONF_VARS array
00316         if (!array_key_exists($extKey, $TYPO3_CONF_VARS['EXT']['extConf'])) {
00317             throw new MOC_Configuration_Exception(sprintf('Missing extConf key "%s"', $extKey));
00318         }
00319 
00320         // Read the EXT_CONF_KEY from TYPO3_CONF_VARS - also unserialize the data
00321         $config = unserialize($TYPO3_CONF_VARS['EXT']['extConf'][$extKey]);
00322         if (empty($config) || !is_array($config)) {
00323             throw new MOC_Configuration_Exception(sprintf('Missing configuration data for extConf "%s"', $extKey));
00324         }
00325 
00326         if ($return) {
00327             return $config;
00328         }
00329 
00330         $this->set($config);
00331     }

00440     protected function __configVarNames($name) {
00441         if (is_string($name)) {
00442             if (strpos($name, ".")) {
00443                 return explode(".", $name);
00444             }
00445             return array($name);
00446         }
00447         return $name;
00448     }
